product_name: Pearl Izumi Thermal Lite Bike Gloves - Women's
long_description: The light and packable Pearl Izumi Thermal Lite bike gloves deliver warmth in those mild shoulder seasons, keeping your hands protected as you cruise along your favorite path. From Pearl Izumi, P.R.O. Thermal Lite fabric provides just the right amount of warmth in chilly weather. Silicone-screened fingertips provide grip. Reflective detailing increases your visibility in low light.
